thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Mette Stanbury
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Mette Stanbury

author: Mette Stanbury
title: Mette Stanbury
text: It was easy getting a Quote: and everything thereafter just worked. I had an urgent query after I had arranged home pick up and it was answered timely and clearly. I recommended the service to my mother-in-law shortly after and she had a great experience with her local Pack & Send office also. I will definitely use the service again. Mette
